entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
